SELECT plan.pl_no , plan.mem_id , plan.pl_rdate , NVL(plan.pl_title, '제목 없음') as pl_title , plan.pl_msize , plan.pl_private , plan.pl_theme ,plan.pl_thumburl, COUNT(plike.pl_like_no) AS like_count FROM planer plan LEFT JOIN planer_like plike ON plan.pl_no = plike.pl_no WHERE
plan.pl_private = 'Y' AND(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, plike.pl_like_date) <= 1 OR plike.pl_like_date IS NULL)
GROUP BY plan.pl_no, plan.mem_id, plan.pl_rdate, plan.pl_title, plan.pl_msize, plan.pl_private, plan.pl_theme, plan.pl_thumburl ORDER BY like_count DESC
